scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Account book of Robert I. Hutchison, 1909-1923, of Craig County. It records accounts with various individuals and banks that relate to Hutchison's life as a farmer. Accounts concern subjects such as the sale and purchase of livestock and land, the purchase of supplies, agriculture duties performed for others such as threshing wheat, building a fence, or plowing a field, insurance paid on farm buildings, payments made on bank debts, and payments to various individuals for services rendered. Entries are arranged by individual or bank name. There is an index at the front of the volume.
